document.full_text: the head of a powerful militia that fought against laurent gbagbo in ivory coast on tuesday pledged allegiance to president alassane ouattara and dismissed reports that his men had fallen out with other fighters.
document.title: ivorian militia chief declares loyalty to ouattara
lines_and_colors: the head of a powerful militia that fought against laurent gbagbo in ivory coast on tuesday pledged allegiance to president alassane ouattara and dismissed reports that his men had fallen out with other fighters.
